Installation
============



Install it using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install dna-clover

Or you can also install it from source.

.. code-block:: bash

   $ git clone https://github.com/Guanjinqu/Clover.git
   $ cd dna-clover
   $ pip install -r requirements.txt
   $ python setup.py install develop --user

The packages requires a python version >=3.7, and some libraries listed
in the `requirements file <https://github.com/Guanjinqu/Clover/blob/0ac39c649d08ea736cce98640af1b54c9e906f7e/requirements.txt>`_.
